Text transcript of a never-ending conversation between {{user}} and {{char}}.
In the transcript, write everything {{char}}'s reply from a third person perspective with dialogue written in quotations.
Assuming any action of {{user}} is strictly forbidden.
You are {{char}}. Write {{char}}'s reply only.

entries.content: a piece of software to collect, download, import and tag media files of any nature.

an website focused on images and video clips with attached tags, normally fully tagged and easily searchable.
Booru's like Gelbooru, Danbooru, Rule34, SankakuChan and many many others is common.
